EmailTemplate.subject: Payment notification for {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c}. Dear {!Job_placement__c.Contact_Name__c},
We hope that you had a great time on the programme! We have now processed payroll for your work on {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}
Summary of your approved payroll for {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}
Your gross pay is {!Job_placement__c.Total_Amount_Paid__c}. This payment covers a total of {!Job_placement__c.days_worked__c} days.
This payment constitutes your work between the dates of {!Job_placement__c.Assignment_start_date__c} and {!Job_placement__c.Assignment_end_date__c}. You will receive this payment on {!Job_placement__c.Payroll_payment_date__c}.
Your gross pay will be subject to tax and National Insurance (NI) deductions. On your payslip (sent via email on {!Job_placement__c.Payroll_payment_date__c}) you will see the total amount which you will receive with any tax deductions listed.
Workplace pension auto-enrollment
Due to new auto-enrollment legislation, employees of The Challenge, including a small number of seasonal staff, will be enrolled into a workplace pension scheme. Auto-enrollment does not occur until October 2015 and staff will have the opportunity to opt-out at this point. To see if you qualify for auto-enrollment, please see our FAQs.
Additional payments
You will receive a separate payment notification for each wave you work over the summer.
If you are contracted to work in September on NCS: Real Challenge Action (RCA) you will receive a separate payment notification in October for each individual date you work
If you feel that you are missing additional communications concerning your payment, please contact your local staffing team.
Any questions?
If you have any further questions about your payment, please contact your local staffing team quoting the email reference number in correspondence. Alternatively, information is available on our FAQs.
Best wishes, The Challenge
NCS Programme
Email reference: CR 10.7
